originalText.text: So many positive things I could share, from those who have benefited from these services. They are truly providing a range of opportunities to allow individuals to find and develop their passion. They provide internships and employment. When I speak to participants it feels great to  hear 1st hand that the funding is going toward the betterment of people,  decreasing recidivism. Great Job!!!

originalText.text: Why are your employees posting lies, including inaccurate and negative reviews of The NYC Department of Probation? This is not acceptable, you should not receive funding!
